{{Refimprove|date=March 2014}} {{Infobox software | name = CuteFTP | caption = CuteFTP 9.0 | developer = GlobalSCAPE | latest_release_version = 9.3.0 (Windows) {{Start date and age|2018|07|11}} <ref>{{cite web |title=Time stamp of executable file |url=ftp://ftp.globalscape.com/pub/cuteftp/cuteftp.exe |date=11 Jul 2018 <!-- 03:19:04 GMT --> |accessdate=4 September 2018}}</ref> / 3.1.2 (Mac) {{Start date and age|2014|01|01}} <!-- When updating this, also update [[Comparison of FTP clients]] --> | operating_system = [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] & [[Mac OS X]] | genre = [[FTP]] client: Home & Pro | license = Proprietary | website = http://www.cuteftp.com }}
'''CuteFTP''' is a series of [[file transfer protocol|FTP]] (file transfer protocol) client applications distributed and supported since 1996 by [[GlobalSCAPE]], who later bought the rights to the software. Both a [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]-based or [[Macintosh|Mac]]-based [[graphical user interface|interface]] were made for both home and professional use.
CuteFTP is used to transfer files between computers and File Transfer Protocol (FTP) servers to publish web pages, download digital images, music, multi-media files and software, and transfer files of any size or type between home and office.<ref>http://www.Globalscape.fr/?product=eft-server French Website with Schreenshot</ref><ref>http://www.Globalscape.it/?product=ftp-server-per-la-piccola-impressa Italian Website with Schreenshots</ref> Since 1999, CuteFTP Pro and CuteFTP Mac Pro have also been available alongside CuteFTP Home with free trial periods.
It was originally developed by Alex Kunadze, a Russian programmer.
== See also == *[[Comparison of FTP client software]]
